Wisdom: الْبَخِيلُ خَازِنٌ لِوَرَثَتِهِ
enWisdom: The miser is a treasurer for his heirs

Wisdom: الْبُخْلُ بِالْمَوْجُودِ سُوءُ الظَّنِّ بِالْمَعْبُودِ
enWisdom: Stinginess with what is available [in one’s possession] is thinking negatively of God

Wisdom: الْحِرْصُ وَالشَّرَهُ وَالْبُخْلُ نَتِيجَةُ الْجَهْلِ
enWisdom: Greed, gluttony and stinginess are the result of ignorance

Wisdom: الْجُبْنُ وَالْحِرْصُ وَالْبُخْلُ غَرَائِزُ سَوْءٍ يَجْمَعُهَا سُوءُ الظَّنِّ بِاللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: Cowardice, greediness and stinginess are evil characteristics that are brought together by thinking ill of Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: الْبَخِيلُ يَبْخَلُ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ بِالْيَسِيرِ مِنْ دُنْيَاهُ وَيَسْمَحُ لِوُرَّاثِهِ بِكُلِّهَا
enWisdom: A miser is stingy towards himself with little of his worldly possessions and leaves all the rest for his heirs

Wisdom: الْبَخِيلُ يَسْمَحُ مِنْ عِرْضِهِ بِأَكْثَرَ مِمَّا أَمْسَكَ مِنْ عَرَضِهِ وَيُضَيِّعُ مِنْ دِينِهِ أَضْعَافَ مَا حَفِظَ مِنْ نَشَبِهِ
enWisdom: A miser gives up of more of his honour than what he holds of his possessions and loses multiple times more of his religion than what he saves of his property

Wisdom: أَرْبَعٌ تَشِينُ الرَّجُلَ الْبُخْلُ وَالْكِذْبُ وَالشَّرَهُ وَسُوءُ الْخُلُقِ
enWisdom: Four things disgrace a man: miserliness, dishonesty, voraciousness and bad manners

Wisdom: أَبْعَدُ الْخَلَائِقِ مِنَ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى الْبَخِيلُ الْغَنِيُّ
enWisdom: The farthest of creatures from Allah, the Exalted, is the wealthy miser

Wisdom: آفَةُ الِاقْتِصَادِ الْبُخْلُ
enWisdom: The bane of moderation is stinginess

Wisdom: بِئْسَ الْخَلِيقَةُ الْبُخْلُ
enWisdom: The worst trait is stinginess

Wisdom: تَجَنَّبُوا الْبُخْلَ وَالنِّفَاقَ فَهُمَا مِنْ أَذَمِّ الْأَخْلَاقِ
enWisdom: Keep away from miserliness and hypocrisy, for these two are from the most reprehensible qualities

Wisdom: لَمْ يُوَفَّقْ مَنْ بَخِلَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ بِخَيْرِهِ وَخَلَّفَ مَالَهُ لِغَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: He who is stingy to himself with his wealth is not successful and leaves behind his possessions for others

Wisdom: مَنْ بَخِلَ بِمَا لَا يَمْلِكُهُ فَقَدْ بَالَغَ فِي الرَّذِيلَةِ
enWisdom: One who is miserly with that which he does not [even] possess, has exceeded in meanness

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَدَعْ وَهُوَ مَحْمُودٌ يَدَعْ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ
enWisdom: One who does not let go [of his wealth] while he is praised will have to leave [it] while he is vilified

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُقَدِّمْ مَالَهُ لِآخِرَتِهِ وَهُوَ مَأْجُورٌ خَلَّفَهُ وَهُوَ مَأْثُومٌ
enWisdom: One who does not forward his wealth for his Hereafter while he is [sure to be] rewarded [for it], leaves it behind while he is sinful

Wisdom: مَنْ بَخِلَ عَلَى الْمُحْتَاجِ بِمَا لَدَيْهِ كَثُرَ سَخَطُ اللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: He who is stingy to the one who needs what he possesses, Allah’s wrath upon him increases

Wisdom: مِنْ سُوءِ الْخُلُقِ الْبُخْلُ وَسُوءُ التَّقَاضِي
enWisdom: It is from bad character to be stingy and abusive in demanding your right

Wisdom: مِنْ أَقْبَحِ الْخَلَائِقِ الشُّحُّ
enWisdom: Avarice is one of the most revolting traits

Wisdom: مَا أَقْبَحَ الْبُخْلَ مَعَ الْإِكْثَارِ
enWisdom: How revolting is stinginess with affluence!

Wisdom: مَا أَقْبَحَ الْبُخْلَ بِذَوِي النُّبْلِ
enWisdom: How revolting is stinginess by those who possess nobility

Wisdom: مَا عَقَدَ إِيمَانَهُ مَنْ بَخِلَ بِإِحْسَانِهِ
enWisdom: He who is stingy with his favours has not fastened his faith [and made it firm]

Wisdom: مَا اجْتُلِبَ سَخَطُ اللَّهِ بِمِثْلِ الْبُخْلِ
enWisdom: Nothing brings down the wrath of Allah like stinginess

Wisdom: مَا عَقَلَ مَنْ بَخِلَ بِإِحْسَانِهِ
enWisdom: He who is stingy with his favours is not intelligent

Wisdom: وَيْحَ الْبَخِيلِ الْمُتَعَجِّلِ الْفَقْرَ الَّذِي مِنْهُ هَرَبَ وَالتَّارِكِ الْغِنَى الَّذِي إِيَّاهُ طَلَبَ
enWisdom: Woe to the miser who hastens towards the poverty which has fled from him and abandons the wealth that has sought him

Wisdom: لَا سَوْءَةَ أَسْوَأُ مِنَ الشُّحِّ
enWisdom: There is no evil trait worse than avarice

Wisdom: لَا سَوْأَةَ أَسْوَأُ مِنَ الْبُخْلِ
enWisdom: There is no evil trait worse than stinginess
